tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to doctor after a routine cholesterol test which had significantly high values. I was taking test as I was about to leave to UK for a long term assignment. After hearing this he asked to take all the tests and also made sure that I am relaxed and not having any tension. He did not prescribe any medication for high cholesterol as all other results were normal, I was very happy and had a big relief. Treating patients is not a big deal making sure the patients is relaxed, comfortable is more important and we will get a good dose of both with Doctor Guru. 

Thanks a lot Doctor, it would be good if you take Practo video consultation for quick reviews if any, just a thought!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good  that I made right  decision  to meet him for second opinion  for complicated  angio grammar report for which I was advised  bypass elsewhere.  He explained  me the alternate procedure  suitable  for my case. He spoke smoothly  and to the point. He explained  me all the medication and their  main side  effects  which I have never heard from other doctors  during  my previous  visit  to  them. He gave me proper  advice regarding  diet and exercise exercise  I can follow  to be healthy.  Thank you Dr  Guru for your  time to explain  everything.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your prompt response and feedback.  We sincerely appreciate your inputs.

review:
I ve visited doctor for my husband's high BP . He explained about the lifestyle changes which helps to reduce BP. He adviced simple blood test and need of ECHO test before doing it which most of the doctors don't do.
He prescribed medications and his staff explained every bit of it like how and when  to take medicines and their side effects also.
I am thankful to Dr. Guru Prasad and his staff for correct treatment and passionate care
reply_text: Thank you very much üòä for your feedback.  We sincerely appreciate it.  üôè

review:
Visited Dr.  Guru for my dad's paplpitation and faint complaints. ECG showed abnormality. He explained  the diagnosis in simple terms. And he suggested  the treatment.  Before procedure  he explained  risks, need of medicine  and patient care in detail. Thanks  to God and Dr.  Guru he is alright  now. 
My dad and whole family  is very thankful to him for being so kind.
reply_text: We sincerely thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate your time and consideration.

review:
I visited for high cholesterol  in report. Doctor  explained  very well .He advised me to change life style and try to reduce  it with exercise  and diet control. I am happy  that he has not given medicine for that and he encouraged  me for life  style change and to check after few months.
I m so glad I met him for my problem. Thanks  for being  such a nice person  and doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Visited for consultation  whether I can take medicine proscribed by a general phisician. His staff suggested
for ECG. Dr.not asked about previous history or family history..etc. ****** advised for thread mill.
reply_text: Hello.I understand  your concern.But this is almost impossible  to not take proper history from the patient  or attendant.Because we have these points  in our prescription  format. And we never advice any patient  for treadmill  testing just like that  because  it needs some clarification  about patient  condition,as well as indications  and contraindications. Still if patients  or their  attendants  have doubt ,they can ask until it's clear to them and moreover  they have all rights to deny the treatment  and investigations  offered  by the doctor anytime. We are ethical in providing patient  care and we never force for any kind of treatment  or investigation.
